level.text: This Chapter is not intended to repeal, abrogate, or impair any existing regulations, easements, covenants, or deed restrictions. However, where this chapter and another conflict or overlap, whichever imposes the more stringent restrictions shall prevail.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 32 DCR 6547, 6562 (November 15, 1985); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 10781 (November 19, 2010).
